comments.body: Do you have reloadable VCCs that work with google ad accounts?In my country, there's a tax on google ad bills(like 20%) which is really daft and takes away any left-out profit. A VCC for google ads will be a perfect option for me. No frivolous taxation and more profit for meÂ   (which I totally deserve lol)
